name: Acting Families Online Trivia | Celebrities Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Timothy Hutton is the son of actor Jim Hutton. In what TV series did Jim star?
questions.explanation:
Ellery Queen.

	"Queen" was one of the first tv shows to challenge the viewer to solve the crime. David Wayne played Ellery's father. "Wendy" starred George Burns and Connie Stevens, "Delvecchio" starred Judd Hirsch, "Friend and Lover" starred Paul Sand.

questions.text: Kate Hudson is the daughter of Goldie Hawn. Who co-starred with Hawn in "Seems Like Old Times" (1980)?
questions.explanation:
Chevy Chase.

	It was based on a Neil Simon piece.

questions.text: Matthew Broderick is the son of actor James Broderick. In what tv series did James star?
questions.explanation:
Family.

	James played the father. Meredith Baxter, Kristi McNichol and Sada Thompson also were in the cast. "Bridget" also featured Meredith Baxter (and David Birney). "Boone" starred Fess Parker, "Paradise" starred Gardner McKay.

questions.text: Alan Alda is the son of veteran actor Robert Alda. Which movie did NOT star Alan Alda?
questions.explanation:
For The Boys.

	"Jenny" (1970) was early in his career and co-starred Marlo Thomas. "Same Time, Next Year" (1978) co-starred Ellen Burstyn in the movie version of the popular play. "For The Boys" (1991), however, starred James Caan and Bette Midler.

questions.text: Jane Fonda must be one of the first children of a major movie star to also become a major movie star. In which movie does she appear with her father, Henry Fonda?
questions.explanation:
On Golden Pond.

	Jane has a small role in the movie. Both actors had superstar careers.The other three choices have Jane in the cast, but not Henry.

questions.text: The Barrymores may be the quintessential acting family. Which Barrymore starred in "Key Largo"?
questions.explanation:
Lionel.

	Lionel appeared in "Key Largo" (1948) with Humphrey Bogart. Lionel, Ethel and John had fine careers. Diana did not.

questions.text: Elizabeth Montgomery is the daughter of Robert Montgomery. Early in her career Liz appeared on the "Twilight Zone". In what role?
options: Movie star who disappears into her film past
questions.explanation:
War survivor.

	She co-stars with Charles Bronson in an Adam-and-Eve type story. Anne Francis plays the mannequin, Agnes Moorehead plays the woman fighting the saucer, Ida Lupino plays the film star.

questions.text: Errol Flynn's son, Sean, took a brief stab at acting. He made a sequel to one of his father's famous movies. Which one?
options: They Died With Their Boots On
questions.explanation:
The Son of Captain Blood.

	The movie was "The Son of Captain Blood" (1964). Sean was ultimately lost in Southeast Asia.

questions.text: Gwyneth Paltrow is the daughter of Blythe Danner. Danner appeared as a guest star as the former girl friend of what classic tv character?
questions.explanation:
Hawkeye Pierce.

	She appears in Korea as a former live-in of Hawkeye's ("MASH").

questions.text: Katharine Hepburn's niece appeared in a movie with her aunt. Which movie?
questions.explanation:
Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?.

	Katharine Houghton played the daughter of Hepburn (and Tracy). Sidney Poitier played her fiancee.
